jacdac.SpeechSynthesisCmd.Cancel: No args. Cancels current utterance and all utterances from the utterance queue.
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisCmd.Speak:
Argument: text string (bytes). Adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.
* ```
const [text] = jdunpack<[string]>(buf, "s")
```
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisReg.Enabled:
Read-write bool (uint8_t). Determines if the speech engine is in a non-paused state.
* ```
const [enabled] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisReg.Lang:
Read-write string (bytes). Language used for utterances as defined in https://www.ietf.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt.
* ```
const [lang] = jdunpack<[string]>(buf, "s")
```
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisReg.Pitch:
Read-write u16.16 (uint32_t). Pitch for utterances
* ```
const [pitch] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16.16")
```
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisReg.Rate:
Read-write u16.16 (uint32_t). Rate for utterances
* ```
const [rate] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16.16")
```
jacdac.SpeechSynthesisReg.Volume:
Read-write ratio u0.8 (uint8_t). Volume for utterances.
* ```
const [volume] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u0.8")
```
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.cancel: Cancels current utterance and all utterances from the utterance queue.
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.enabled: Determines if the speech engine is in a non-paused state.
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.lang: Language used for utterances as defined in https://www.ietf.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt.
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.setEnabled: Determines if the speech engine is in a non-paused state.
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.setLang: Language used for utterances as defined in https://www.ietf.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt.
modules.SpeechSynthesisClient.speak: Adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.
